title: 服务器关闭动物刷新动物还是会刷新求教
author: zxc5280858

replies.author: Abraham511
replies.txt_content:
那可能是GameRule没有设置

1.在主城输入/killall先清除所有生物
2.在主城世界输入/gameruledoMobSpawning False

这样试一下？

replies.author: zxc5280858
replies.txt_content: 我给我的地皮关闭了怪物刷新关闭了动物刷新但是还是刷新动物出来

replies.author: 叶金子
replies.txt_content: /mvm set mobspawning false 地皮世界名称

replies.author: LexOBurner
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule doMobSpawning false
/mv modify set difficulty 0
两个都输入一遍
